description:
Essential Cooking Calculators will become your new partner in the kitchen. These calculators will save you time and eliminate the guessing in doing many complex conversions. There are 18 calculators, conversion tables and handy look ups included.

Weight to Volume Converter - choose from 180 common ingredients to convert a quantity between 28 common weight and volume measurements.

Recipe Scaling - add, subtract, multiply and divide whole and fraction measurements to help scale recipes.

Fraction to Decimal - convert a fraction to it's decimal equivalent.

Decimal to Fraction - convert a decimal to it's fraction equivalent.

Temperature Converter - Convert between 5 common temperature scales.

Convection Oven Converter - Convert a time and temperature from a conventional oven to a convection oven.

Ingredient Weight Conversion - convert a given quantity between 69 common (and not so common!) weight measurements.

Crockpot Conversions - cooking times and temperatures for many common dishes.

BBQ Grilling Guides - Exhaustive list of grill times for beef, pork, poultry, vegetable, game, fruit, lamb and seafood.

Heirloom Measurements - Many measurements from old recipes.

Turkey Dinner Estimator - for a given number of adults and children, estimate amount of turkey, gravy and stuffing needed.

Turkey Defroster - defrosting time needed for a given weight.

Ingredient Substitutes - a huge list of ingredients and their substitutes with measurements. 

Sugar Substitutes - table of many sugar substitutes and their equivalent sugar measurements.

Spice Mix Table - many popular spice mixes with ingredients.

Honey Flavors - a fun look up of many different honey flavors.

Soup and Stew glossary - learn the difference between many soups and stews.

v1.2.0 - Added Turkey Defroster.

Future calculators will be updated and enhanced based on user feedback. Send your comments and ideas to me at support@sidetop.com.
